posts.content:
Greetings all, and thanks for your time
So I've been playing on a server called Avlis, and i recently got an idea for a character
A Druid/Barb that spends most of it's time in elemental form, buffs itself, and uses rage.
If this is able to be played decently, could you guys help me build one of these?
(Build info)
Human or elf base or subrace(http://wiki.avlis.org/Custom_Races )
Must have Druid levels and Barbarian levels(the server has a few changes to those aswell, so i'll try to link them)
http://wiki.avlis.org/Elemental_Shape
http://wiki.avlis.org/Barbarian
http://wiki.avlis.org/Druid
http://wiki.avlis.org/Barbarian_Rage
http://wiki.avlis.org/Main_Page
So, yet again, thanks for your time.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: A Druid 24/ Barbarian 15/ Rogue 1 (OR Monk 1, if alignment changes are permited) should be a pretty powerful terrifying dragon & undispellable caster with full ranks in tumble plus UMD. It will mature late though, but has incredible potencial. Or else a straight Druid 24/ Barbarian 16 with terrifying rage.

posts.author: SkagHunter
posts.content: Thanks, that sounds pretty good. If anyone gets a chance, could you perhaps build out/make this? I'm really not that good at actually getting things optimized.

posts.content:
Sure man, i will do it for you since you liked the idea, but you did not tell me if Alignment changes are allowed yet.

Adding Monk to the mix makes for a far more powerful terrifying dragon, rogue is for necessity reasons in case the shift in alignment is not allowed.

posts.author: SkagHunter
posts.content:
Alright thanks. Alignment changes are allowed, but it's a rp server, so going back and forth for the purpose of a build wouldn't be allowed. Also, i think they frown on barb/monk combos, so i'd have to say
rogue instead of monk.

Thanks again.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Alright, this has been done in a hurry, so if anyone wants to chime in and improve it even a little bit-it would be good for SkagHunter's benefit.

Before i go on with the build, i will say why some things have been done in such a way. Barbarian 16 instead of 15 give us 1 additional Terrifying Rage use per day, so i went for that. Rogue 2 makes skill dumps easier and give us Evasion too. The rest of lvls went all for Druid to increase his caster lvls, every little bit helps since he is still primarily a caster. Druid 12/ Barbarian 8 instead of the slightly more potent Druid 8/ Barbarian 12, pre-epic increases playability, so i went for that. Unfortunately there aren't many feats in epics so i could not take ESF: Conjuration OR ESF: Intimidate but his spells DC's are good and you can count on them, little will survive a 37 DC for your stoneholds or a 40 DC for your storms of vengeance. This build takes also Zen Archery so it will help you at your entire career and can set all deadly (except Gas) traps as well, i made sure you will have additional modes of attack in case something won't work for a particular fight. With additional help from UMD you can pretty much assure you will always have the right tool for the job, and you have a great skill-set with lots of skill points as well. As an additional twist we could suffle your pre-epic feats & lvls in order to take Stunning Fist 10/ Day instead of Zen Archery & Wf: Longbow. Your stunning fist DC will be a very high 47 at the end (buffed), so this might be worth it, if you are not interested on archery at all, but for now i will leave it as it is, waiting your feedback.
